  • Class
    Description
    Ball
    This class is the Ball model which contains all the data and behaviour of Ball.
    BallFactory
    A class make different kinds of ball and return it to the caller method.
    Brick
    An abstract model class that contains the data and behaviour of all bricks in the game.
    BrickFactory
    A class that create different types of bricks according to the parameters received.
    CementBrick
    A concrete Cement Brick class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Brick class.
    ClayBrick
    A concrete Clay Brick class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Brick class.
    Crack
    A class that defines the appearance and behaviour of crackable brick.
    DebugConsoleModel
    A model that contains data for the debug console.
    GameBoardModel
    A model that contains data for the gameBoard view and controller.
    GameLevels
    A class that handles all the levels making in the game.
    GameLogic
    A class which contains all the entities logics and interactions in the game.
    MetalBrick
    A concrete Metal Brick class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Brick class.
    Mobile
    An interface that has two moving methods.
    PauseMenuModel
    A model class that contains data for the pause menu.
    Player
    A model class that defines the player data and behaviour.
    RubberBall
    A concrete Rubber ball class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Ball class.
    SteelBrick
    A concrete Steel Brick class that inherits the methods and behaviours from the abstract Brick class.
    TextAnimator
    A class to run the text animation.
    TextOutput
    An interface for the text output.
